363    public LineItem build() {
364        Objects.requireNonNull(id, LineItem.class + ": id is missing");
365        Objects.requireNonNull(productId, LineItem.class + ": productId is missing");
366        Objects.requireNonNull(name, LineItem.class + ": name is missing");
367        Objects.requireNonNull(productType, LineItem.class + ": productType is missing");
368        Objects.requireNonNull(variant, LineItem.class + ": variant is missing");
369        Objects.requireNonNull(price, LineItem.class + ": price is missing");
370        Objects.requireNonNull(totalPrice, LineItem.class + ": totalPrice is missing");
371        Objects.requireNonNull(quantity, LineItem.class + ": quantity is missing");
372        Objects.requireNonNull(state, LineItem.class + ": state is missing");
373        Objects.requireNonNull(discountedPricePerQuantity, LineItem.class + ": discountedPricePerQuantity is missing");
374        Objects.requireNonNull(priceMode, LineItem.class + ": priceMode is missing");
375        Objects.requireNonNull(lineItemMode, LineItem.class + ": lineItemMode is missing");
376        return new LineItemImpl(id, productId, name, productSlug, productType, variant, price, taxedPrice, totalPrice,
377            quantity, addedAt, state, taxRate, supplyChannel, distributionChannel, discountedPricePerQuantity,
378            priceMode, lineItemMode, custom, shippingDetails, lastModifiedAt);
379    }

394    public static LineItemBuilder of(final LineItem template) {
395        LineItemBuilder builder = new LineItemBuilder();
396        builder.id = template.getId();
397        builder.productId = template.getProductId();
398        builder.name = template.getName();
399        builder.productSlug = template.getProductSlug();
400        builder.productType = template.getProductType();
401        builder.variant = template.getVariant();
402        builder.price = template.getPrice();
403        builder.taxedPrice = template.getTaxedPrice();
404        builder.totalPrice = template.getTotalPrice();
405        builder.quantity = template.getQuantity();
406        builder.addedAt = template.getAddedAt();
407        builder.state = template.getState();
408        builder.taxRate = template.getTaxRate();
409        builder.supplyChannel = template.getSupplyChannel();
410        builder.distributionChannel = template.getDistributionChannel();
411        builder.discountedPricePerQuantity = template.getDiscountedPricePerQuantity();
412        builder.priceMode = template.getPriceMode();
413        builder.lineItemMode = template.getLineItemMode();
414        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
415        builder.shippingDetails = template.getShippingDetails();
416        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
417        return builder;
418    }
